text: Olive Ann Alcorn (October 2, 1900 - January 8, 1972) was an American dancer, model, and silent movie actress of the 1910s and 1920s. She was known for the many nude photographs of her from the era than for her movie work. ==References== ==Other websites== * Olive Ann Alcorn at silentera.com * Silent Film Star: Olive Ann Alcorn at Noir and Chick Flicks * The Phantom of the Opera 1925 Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Models from Minnesota Category:American dancers Category:Deaths from anal cancer Category:1900 births Category:1975 deaths
title: Olive Ann Alcorn
